page.title: 08Upton Deanery Youth Festival
page.content:
The Upton Deanery held a Youth Festival in recognition of the{Inter {national Year for Youth.}It was organ- ised by the vicar and local middle school staff.
For four hours on Sunday, June 5th, 1985 about 450 people packed the church and churchyard in Longdon to be entertained by the local children who sang, played and danced. A variety of craft work was on show including an outstanding display of woodwork.
The vicar wrote: "The whole of this programme has been an act of worship in which young people have made an offering to God in thanksgiving for whatever skill or ability they have been able to develop. We wish them well in the continuing developement of their talents".
